verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:22
verses.text: Cursed be he that lieth with his sister, the daughter of his father, or the daughter of his mother. And all the people shall say, Amen.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:23
verses.text: Cursed be he that lieth with his mother in law. And all the people shall say, Amen.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:24
verses.text: Cursed be he that smiteth his neighbour secretly. And all the people shall say, Amen.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:25
verses.text: Cursed be he that taketh reward to slay an innocent person. And all the people shall say, Amen.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 27:26
verses.text: Cursed be he that confirmeth not all the words of this law to do them. And all the people shall say, Amen.
